channel.title: MATLAB App Designer on Ignacio Sadurni
channel.description: Recent content in MATLAB App Designer on Ignacio Sadurni

item.title: Aviation Crash Report App
item.description: Utilized MATLAB and its App Designer to develop an app for analyzing historical aviation accidents. Generated comprehensive reports on various statistics derived from global aviation accidents data. Enhanced understanding of aviation safety and trends throughout history through detailed analysis and visualization of accident data. NOTE. For more information on how the app works, watch the demo below:
